description: This file defines the SplashActivity class, which is the launcher screen for an Android TV application. It shows a splash screen with 'MyTV' for approximately 3 seconds before navigating to HomeActivity. It manages focus for the D-pad and schedules automatic navigation to the next activity.

classes.name: SplashActivity
classes.description: Launcher activity for the Android TV app, shows splash screen and navigates to HomeActivity after delay.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets layout, manages focus, and schedules transition to HomeActivity after a delay.

methods.name: onDestroy
methods.description: Cleans up by removing any pending callbacks when the activity is destroyed.
